initialHypo: I am somewhat certain this hypothesis will be supported
finalHypo: I am certain this hypothesis is supported
conclusionFreeResponse: There is good agreement between the hypothesis and the data collected. Intermediate locations in space have intermediate values in both moisture percentage and shear strength, no weird one-offs. Let's stop collecting data now; data is money!

objectives.objective: The data seems to be supporting the hypothesis so far but additional evaluation is needed

userSteps.hypoConfidence: I am certain this hypothesis is supported
userSteps.transition: Ignore suggestions and select a location for RHex to sample next

userSteps.hypoConfidence: I am certain this hypothesis is supported
userSteps.transition: Stop data collection and make a conclusion about the hypothesis

surveyResponses.text: How often did you hold multiple beliefs at a time (e.g., believing simultaneously that there are areas along the dune transect where data is needed, AND that there are potential discrepancies between measurements and the given hypothesis that needs to be further investigated)?
When you held multiple beliefs, how did you resolve them?
If the robot collected data autonomously using its own suggestions, how satisfied would you be with the resulting data collection strategy?
The robot's suggestions were useful <u>when my reported belief was to increase spatial coverage</u>.
The robot's  suggestions were useful <u>when my reported belief was to increase moisture-range coverage</u>.
The robot's suggestions were useful <u>when my reported belief was that there was a discrepancy between the data and hypothesis that needed further evaluation</u>.
The robot's suggestions were useful <u>when my reported belief was the the data was supporting the hypothesis but additional evaluation was needed</u>.
If you were to use this robot for data collection in real life, what changes or improvements would you make in how the robot interacts with you to suggest locations?
surveyResponses.value: I would not necessarily want the robot to suggest locations, even if I found the selected locations to be satisfactory.

surveyResponses.text: Have you completed a bachelor's degree?
How many years of practice do you have, post bachelor's degree?
Are you in academia or industry
Which best describes your current position?
How would you describe your specialization?
Are you familiar with any of the features of this decision making scenario? Have you ever collected data at White Sands National Monument before or investigated a similar research question?
